name: Url Redirect Rewrite
author: Gokulakrishnan KS

sections.description:
You can create unlimited redirections and rewrites. A redirect and rewrite can be used in many situations, for example:

  • to hide an url you don’t want to show;
  • to short a long url;
  • to monitor the traffic of an url;
  • to redirect the users in another page during a maintenance;
  • to redirect user from a dormiant domain;
  • to rewrite the content with customized urls
  • to customize whatever name you want

Language available only in english
sections.installation:
• Upload the files on the plugins section of your WordPress;
  • Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress;
  • You can change the options clicking on the left sidebar of WordPress;
  • Create a new page/post and watch the option at the end of the page.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  • Upload the files on the plugins section of your WordPress;
  • Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress;
  • You can change the options clicking on the left sidebar of WordPress;
  • Create a new page/post and watch the option at the end of the page.
